info.title: API 2.0
info.description: Early release of version 2.0 of the Vend API.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of brands.
Returns a single brand with a requested ID
Returns a paginated list of consignments.

post.description: Creates a new consignment of type `STOCKTAKE`. Currently, this endpoint only supports creation of inventory counts (stock takes).

get.description: Returns a single consignment with the requested ID.

put.description: Updates the inventory count with requested ID.

delete.description: Deletes the consignment with the given ID.

get.description: Returns a collection of consignment products associated with the specified consignment.
get.summary: List all products for a specific consignment
get.operationId: List all products for a specific consignment

parameters.name: consignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the consignment for which products should be listed.

post.description: Increases or decreases the count for a specific product within the inventory count.

delete.description: Removes the count for a specific product from the inventory count.
delete.summary: Delete an item from an inventory count
delete.operationId: Delete an item from an inventory count

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The ID of a product included in the inventory count

get.description: Returns a paginated list of customer groups.
Returns a paginated list of customers.
Returns a single customer with a requested ID.

put.description: Updates the customer with the requested ID.

delete.description: Deletes the customer with the requested ID.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of Inventory records.
Returns a collection of outlets.
Returns a single outlet with the requested ID.
Returns a paginated list of price book products.
Returns a paginated list of price books
Returns a single price book with a requested ID

Returns the metadata for a single product image with a given ID.
This method is useful for checking the status of an image after it was uploaded.

put.description: Allows for changing the image position in the list

delete.description: Deletes the product_image with the requested ID.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of product types.
Returns a paginated list of products.
Returns a single product object with a given ID.

post.description: Upload a binary file with an image to be used for a product. This request should be encoded as `multipart/form-data`.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The ID of the product which the imaged should be associated with.

get.description: Returns inventory data for a single product in all the outlets.
get.summary: Get inventory data for a single product
get.operationId: Get inventory data for a single product

get.description: Returns a paginated list of registers.
Returns a single register with the requested ID.
Returns a paginated list of sales.
Returns a paginated list of suppliers.
Returns a single supplier with a given ID.
Returns a collection of tags.
Returns a paginated list of taxes.

data.description: An array of Brand objects wrapped in top level `data` object.

outlet_id.description: A valid ID of an outlet where stock will be received.

received_at.description: 11-30T19:08:541+00:00 (timestamp) - The date when consignment was received.

source_outlet_id.description: A valid ID of an outlet where stock will come from. **Stock transfers only**.

total_cost_gain.description: The cost of items over the expected level.

total_count_loss.description: The number of items below the expected level.

total_cost_loss.description: The cost of items below the expected level.

total_count_gain.description: The number of items over the expected level.

data.description: An array of consignment objects wrapped in a top level `data` object.

customer_code.description: Customer code used for claiming loyalty.

gender.description: Customer's gender. Can be `M`, `F` or null.

custom_field_1.description: Custom field 1. Can be used to store random data.

customer_code.description: Customer code used for claiming loyalty.

gender.description: Customer's gender. Can be `M`, `F` or null.

custom_field_1.description: Custom field 1. Can be used to store random data.

data.description: An array of customer group objects wrapped in top level `data` object.

product_id.description: The ID of the product this image is associated with.

position.description: Position of the image in collection of images associated with a product.

status.description: Status if the image upload processing. Can be `processing`, `uploaded`, `error`.

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this inventory record.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet associated with this inventory record.

reorder_point.description: Level at which a product should be automatically included in stock orders.

reorder_amount.description: Amount to be added to the automatic stock order.+ version: 1288421 (number) - Auto-incrementing object version number.

data.description: An array of Inventory records wrapped in top level `data` object.

outlet_id.description: The ID of the outlet in which the count is taking place.

due_at.description: The date for which the count is scheduled.

show_inactive.description: Indicates whether inactive products should be included in the count.

name.description: The name of the inventory count

status.description: The status of the inventory count. One of: `STOCKTAKE_SCHEDULED`, `STOCKTAKE_IN_PROGRESS`, `STOCKTAKE_IN_PROGRESS_PROCESSED`, `STOCKTAKE_COMPLETE`.

filters.description: An array of filter objects. Max 25.

type.description: Consignment type, for inventory counts always `STOCKTAKE`

value.description: The ID of the filter object.

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this count item.

is_included.description: Indicated whether the item was included via a filter. Can be `null`. For full count (no filters) always `true`.

status.description: The status of the item. One of: `PENDING`, `SUCCESS`.

product_id.description: The ID of the product for which the count should be adjusted.

discount_total.description: Total discount for the line item.

is_return.description: Indicates whether this line item is a return from another sale (referenced by `return_for` on the main sale object).

cost.description: Unit cost for the line item.

cost_total.description: Total cost for the line item.

price_total.description: Total price for the line item.

tax.description: Unit tax for the line item. **deprecated** ???

quantity.description: Quantity of product units included in the sale.

tax_components.description: Collection of tax components associated with the line item.

discount.description: Discount. ??? Unit? Should that be even posted?

loyalty_value.description: The value that should be added to associated customer's loyalty balance.

price_set.description: Indicates whether the price was set manually. Using `true` means that the value will never be refreshed from the price book when reloaded (sale retrieved from parked sales).

sequence.description: Order of the line item in the sale.

default_tax_id.description: Default tax id used for sales in this outlet. **deprecated**

display_prices.description: Indicates whether prices in this outlet should be displayed as tax-inclusive.

data.description: An array of Outlet objects  wrapped in top level `data` object.

retailer_payment_type_id.description: A valid retailer payment type ID.

payment_type_id.description: A payment type associated with the retailer payment type. **deprecated** ???

customer_group_id.description: The ID of the customer group

valid_from.description: The date when the price book becomes valid (active).

valid_to.description: The date when the price book becomes invalid (inactive).

outlet_id.description: The ID of an outlet for which the price book should be used.+ type: GENERAL (string) - Internal value. Safe to ignore.

customer_group_id.description: The ID of the customer group

valid_from.description: The date when the price book becomes valid (active).

valid_to.description: The date when the price book becomes invalid (inactive).

outlet_id.description: The ID of an outlet for which the price book should be used.

data.description: An array of price book objects wrapped in a top level `data` object.

product_id.description: The ID of the associated product.

price_book_id.description: The ID of the price book this product belongs to.

min_units.description: The minimum number of items for which this price will be used.

max_units.description: The maximum number of items for which this price will be used.+ version: 1288421 (number) - Auto-incrementing object version number.

data.description: An array of price book objects wrapped in a top level `data` object.

handle.description: Product handle. **Note:** Variants share the same handle.

sku.description: Product sku. **Note:** Should be unique, but it's not verified while posting.

variant_parent_id.description: This value is set if a Product is a variant of another Product.

source.description: Indicates the origin of the product. Can be USER, SYSTEM, SHOPIFY.

active.description: Indicated whether the Product is active.

has_inventory.description: Indicates whether inventory is being tracked for the Product.

is_composite.description: Indicates whether the Product is a composite one.

description.description: A detailed description of the Product. **Note** Can contain HTML.

variant_options.description: A list of variant option objects.

data.description: An array of Product objects wrapped in top level `data` object.
An array of Product Type objects wrapped in top level `data` object.

outlet_id.description: A valid ID of an Outlet that this register is associated with.

print_receipt.description: Indicates whether a receipt should be printed after a sale.

email_receipt.description: Indicates whether a receipt should be emailed after a sale.

invoice_sequence.description: The numeric part of the last issued invoice.

is_open.description: Indicates if the Register is currently open.

register_open_time.description: Date/time when the register was open. Always in UTC.

register_close_time.description: Date/time when the register was closed. Null if currently open.

register_open_sequence_id.description: **internal** The ID of the current register closure object.

cash_managed_payment_type_id.description: **internal** The ID of the payment type used for cash management transactions in this regsiter.

data.description: An array Register objects wrapped in a top level `data` object.

outlet_id.description: Valid outlet ID for the retailer.

return_for.description: Reference ID to a different sale if this sale was created as a return.

register_id.description: Valid register ID for the retailer.

user_id.description: Valid user ID for the retailer.

status.description: Sale status. One of: CLOSED, SAVED, ONACCOUNT, ONACCOUNT_CLOSED, LAYBY, LAYBY_CLOSED. VOIDED ???

customer_id.description: Valid customer ID for the retailer.

invoice_number.description: Invoice number which if provided, should use the prefix and suffix defined for the register.

short_code.description: 6 character code used in the loyalty system. ???

data.description: An array of Sales wrapped in top level `data` object.
An array of Suppliers wrapped in top level `data` object.

is_default.description: Indicates whether the tax is used as the default one.

display_name.description: The name of the tax used for display.

name.description: The name of the tax rate.

display_name.description: The name of the tax rate used for display.

image.description: File to upload. Can be in jpg or png format.

value.description: The value of a Variant Option.
